allReviews.Review Text: Friendship employees are always so helpful whether by phone or in person. Very friendly, they listen to you and are quick to resolve and issues or explain things when it's just misunderstood. Even after moving over to Kentucky I still bank with them and make the drive.
It is good. People are friendly. Nothing has gone wrong so far.
Think of a merger it should help with the credit system you may have
Accessible, customer service, Always a pleasure to visit. Home Town banking at its best !
All of the people at the Batesville branch are fantastic. Very helpful and friendly.
Always friendly and greet you by name. I love the fact that you talk to a real person when calling in and not a robot.
Everyone there is always very helpful in anything that I need for me or for my mom. It’s a great place to bank.

I grew up in Friendship and have never used any other bank. My farther purchased our farm on Possum Trot Ridge in 1949 with a mortgage through the Friendship State Bank. I have been a customer of the bank since I was about 10 years old ( I am now 80), Wilke Lemon was the president of the bank when I opened my first account. It has been a great, lifelong financial relationship. I have heard horror stories about other banks, but I have never had an issue that wasn't resolved quickly and with the utmost professionalism. Much thanks to this bank for all of the financial guidance and assistance over these many years as a proud customer.

You can count on the ladies at the Vevay branch, Bridgett Kati Heather and Rhonda. I’ve had several mix ups when depositing at another branch due to another individual having the same name , I call them and it’s figured out within a few minutes. Awesome knowing you have people like that taking the extra time with their customers.

My husband and myself made an appointment with Loan Officer Cathy Cutter at the Vevay Branch.  I had just gotten home from a hospital stay a few days before the scheduled appointment. We went to the appointment but I was still not feeling so well. Long story short, Cathy could not have been more concerned and compassionate.  So much so that she came to our home the following day for us to complete the process  as opposed to requiring me to return to the bank on that date.  I so appreciate the extra effort on her part to accommodate  me at that time.  She certainly went above and beyond to take care of Friendship Bank customers.  I will be forever grateful.
The Tellers are the best. Always have a smile and quick to serve.
The tellers are always nice and helpful.
I've been a customer for quite a few years now and all of the employees are friendly and very helpful and knowledgeable about most anything I have questions or concerns about.. Good bank.

I wish there was a way to give 20 stars for their incredible customer service.  We are moving and they have been amazing thru the whole mortgage process.  They went above and beyond and sent us a Kroger gift card for working with their insurance company and that really showed how much they value their customers.  We are 1st time customers with their company and will be customers for life!!
I have banked with this Bank for about 20 yrs & have never had any problems. They are a hometown bank so they feel like family.

Every time you turn around, they are locking your card so you cannot use it. I stopped to get gas one morning after work, put my card in and it said my card was declined, I had just gotten paid. I found out the froze my card from that gas station because they thought it was a fraudulent transaction.Then you go to use your card and can't because, gues what, you've already spent to much of your own money for the day. It's my money, I  need access to it when and how I need it, not how they want me to have it. We don't live in a dictatorship here.
Bridgett Gray helped me out so so much with my online banking! Great service
Great services and great People
Several large mistakes from putting the wrong name on an estate checking account to putting my money into somebody else’s account

outstanding customer service, every single time! No matter if you were visiting as a walk-in customer or just need to work things out over the phone, you are treated with patients and concern. Not a single complaint about any Friendship Bank experience ever! We have been customers for just over 10 years now.
Batesville team very helpful. Julie perfect.
Heather, Kati and Bridget are irreplaceable. Always kind and helpful!

Everyone is exceptionally nice and if they don’t know they will get you what you r looking for.   They go the extra mile for sure.   Highly recommend   They make it happen!  Also Tracy Lemon and Laff Dobbs.  Awesome guys

The tellers are super friendly, and this bank does NOT charge $30 per day if you accidentally go over budget with your debit card. It’s your money people, choose your bank wisely. I would highly recommend Friendship State Bank.
